summary: Phase 1 complete (unified chain structure). Phase 2 BLOCKED: combined_seed_consistent cannot be proven because independent Lindenbaum extensions can add incompatible H formulas. Recommend pivot to RecursiveSeed approach.

artifacts.summary: Unified chain structure with combined GContent/HContent seeds (9 sorries, Phase 1 complete)
Implementation summary documenting blocking issue and pivot recommendation

partial_progress.details: Phase 2 (combined_seed_consistent) has a fundamental flaw: different MCSs in the chain can have incompatible temporal formulas because Lindenbaum extensions are independent. HContent(M_0) union HContent(M_1) may be inconsistent even though each is individually consistent.
partial_progress.blocking_reason: Mathematical obstacle - combined seed approach fundamentally flawed

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented unified chain structure (Phase 1) but Phase 2 blocked: combined_seed_consistent theorem cannot be proven due to independent Lindenbaum extensions allowing incompatible H formulas across MCSs. Recommend pivot to RecursiveSeed approach.
